00044 class SessionHandler : public SessionCallback {
00045 public:
00046   virtual void jeopardy() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Jeopardy" << endl; }
00047   virtual void safe() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Safe" << endl; }
00048   virtual void expired() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Expired" << endl; }
00049 };
00050 
00051 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00052   typedef Cons<HyperspaceCommandShellPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> MyPolicy;
00053 
00054   CommandShellPtr shell;
00055   CommandInterpreterPtr interp;
00056   Session *session;
00057   Comm *comm;
00058   SessionHandler session_handler;
00059 
00060   try {
00061     init_with_policy<MyPolicy>(argc, argv);
00062     HsClientState::exit_status = 0;
00063     comm = Comm::instance();
00064 
00065     session = new Hyperspace::Session(comm, properties, &session_handler);
00066 
00067     interp = session->create_hs_interpreter();
00068     shell = new CommandShell("hyperspace", interp, properties);
00069     interp->set_silent(shell->silent());
00070     interp->set_test_mode(shell->test_mode());
00071 
00072 
00073     if(!session->wait_for_connection(30000)) {
00074       cerr << "Unable to establish connection with Hyperspace, exitting..."
00075            << endl;
00076       exit(1);
00077     }
00078 
00079     HsClientState::exit_status = shell->run();
00080     return HsClientState::exit_status;
00081   }
00082   catch(Exception &e) {
00083     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00084     return 1;
00085   }
00086   return 0;
00087 }
